title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 482 - Air Pollution Program Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 482 - Air Pollution Program Fees

State Regulations

Subpart 482-1 - Air Quality Control Program Fee (§ 482-1.1 to 482-1.3)

Subpart 482-2 - Operating Permit Program Fee (§ 482-2.1 to 482-2.4)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 482

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§3-0301, 72-0201, 72-0303

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
